title: India Got a Trade Deal. Now Comes the Hard Part
description: On today’s Big Take Asia podcast: The US-India trade deal drives down tariffs, but hinges on a hard promise for India to keep — that it will stop buying Russian crude.
content: On today’s Big Take Asia podcast: The US-India trade deal drives down tariffs, but hinges on a hard promise for India to keep — that it will stop buying Russian crude.
